description:
Conquer technical winter terrain effortlessly. The Rage ice tools feature a triple-component handle with various grip positions for a natural swing on ice or better traction on rock.

With its multiple grip positions, an easily changeable pick and add-ons, you can choose how to climb and be confident in the mountains.

  • Aggressively curved shaft provides clearance and balance to keep you composed on the ice
  • Triple-component handle has multiple grip positions and can be adjusted to fit different hand sizes and glove thicknesses
  • Hardened steel mixed pick has more teeth and a versatile profile that bites deeply in a variety of grips
  • Steel spike can bear up to 8kN of load and has a hole for attaching a carabiner
  • Compatible with various accessories, such as the mixed blade, the accelerator, the adze, and the hammer (not included)
name: Edelrid Rage Ice Tool
